code: import axios from'axios';import{Popular_Movie,options}from"../utils/constant";import{getPopularMovie}from'../redux/movieSlice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';const usePopularMovies=async()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();try{const res=await axios.get(Popular_Movie,options);dispatch(getPopularMovie(res.data.results));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export default usePopularMovies;
